definition: to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: The error depends on the calibration accuracy of the amplitude response.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法的误差取决于幅频特性曲线的标定精度。

sentences.english: This thermometer is calibrated by centigrade.
sentences.chinese: 这种温度计是用摄氏百分度标定的。

sentences.english: One-circle calibration method is adopted to realize auto-calibration.
sentences.chinese: 采用一周标定法实现电子罗盘的自动校准。

sentences.english: In the fourth chapter, two novel self-calibration algorithm are proposed according to certain application envirenment.
sentences.chinese: 第五章提出两种针对不同应用背景的改进自标定算法。

sentences.english: In this paper, a linear camera self-calibration technique based on projective reconstruction is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于射影重建的线性摄像机自标定方法。

sentences.english: The set of parameters with the minimum mean square error is regarded as the calibration result.
sentences.chinese: 最后取矢径均方误差最小的参数组作为标定结果。

sentences.english: This paper raises an automatic camera calibration method based on the traditional calibration method.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于传统相机标定方式的自动标定方法。

sentences.english: This paper raises an automatic camera calibration method based on the traditional calibration method.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于传统相机标定方式的自动标定方法。

sentences.english: A floating calibration method for resistance moisture teller is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于浮动定标原理的示值标定方法。

sentences.english: The rectangle light is shield can be marked precisely, time of keeping off light is measured by single chip Microcomputer.
sentences.chinese: 光栏的宽度可准确标定，挡光时间由单片机测量。

sentences.english: PRM should be determinated during new drug development and research.
sentences.chinese: 在新药开发过程中，需要标定自己的药品标准物质。

sentences.english: To solve this , a dy2 namic on2line calibration method is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对此，本文提出一种动态在线标定法。

sentences.english: A calibration method for linear structured light measure system is also proposed.
sentences.chinese: 还提出一种适用于线结构光测量系统的标定方法。

sentences.english: The discharge coefficient for each elbow flowmeter should be calibrated in practice.
sentences.chinese: 每个弯管流量计的流量系数须经过实际标定。

sentences.english: The indices of all Kikuchi bands and zone axes can be indexed and displayed by the program.
sentences.chinese: 程序可以自动标定并显示菊池带与菊池极的指数。

sentences.english: This is one of a calibration procedure.
sentences.chinese: 这是其中的一个标定程序。

definition: to proofread and correct/to edit and rectify/to correct/to calibrate
